question: a , b and c are partners . a receives 2 / 3 of profits , b and c dividing the remainder equally . a ' s income is increased by rs . 200 when the rate to profit rises from 5 to 7 percent . find the capital of b ?

8 men can do a piece of work in 12 days . 4 women can do it in 48 days and 10 children can do it in 24 days . in how many days can 10 men , 20 women and 10 children together complete the piece of work ?

peter and tom shared the driving on a certain trip . if peter and tom both drove for the same amount of time , but peter only drove 2 / 5 of the total distance , what was the ratio of tom ' s average speed to peter ' s average speed ?
for any number y , y * is defined as the greatest positive even integer less than or equal to y . what is the value of 5.0 – 5.0 * ?
the h . c . f . of two numbers is 5 and their l . c . m . is 150 . if one of the numbers is 25 , then the other is :
vishal invested 10 % more than trishul . trishul invested 10 % less than raghu . if the total sum of their investments is rs . 7225 , how much amount did raghu invest ?
if you write down all the numbers from 1 to 100 , then how many times do you write 3 ?

when a student joe , weighing 43 kg , joins a group of students whose average weight is 30 kg , the average weight goes up by 1 kg . subsequently , if two students , excluding joe , leave the group the average weight comes back to 30 kg . what is the difference between the average weight of the two students who left and the weight of joe ?

drum x is 1 / 2 full of oil and drum y , which has twice the capacity of drum x , is 1 / 4 full of oil . if all of the oil in drum x is poured into drum y , then drum y will be filled to what capacity ?
if the number is divided by 3 , it reduced by 24 . the number is

at the opening of a trading day at a certain stock exchange , the price per share of stock k was $ 10 . if the price per share of stock k was $ 15 at the closing of the day , what was the percent increase in the price per share of stock k for that day ?
there are 24 students in a class . in how many different ways can a committee of 3 students be formed ?
there are 17 teams in the hockey league , and each team faces all the other teams 10 times each . how many games are played in the season ?
39 persons can repair a road in 12 days , working 10 hours a day . in how many days will 30 persons , working 6 hours a day , complete the work ?
if an object travels 200 feet in 2 seconds , what is the object ' s approximate speed in miles per hour ? ( note : 1 mile = 5280 feet )
how many prime numbers are between 13 / 3 and 83 / 6 ?
if n is a prime number greater than 17 , what is the remainder when n ^ 2 is divided by 12 ?

an artist who needs to buy only paint and canvas finds that the cost of canvas has decreased by 40 percent and the cost of paint has decreased by 60 percent . if paint previously accounted for 4 times as much of the expense of painting as did canvas , by what percent did the total cost for paint and canvas decrease ?
if a is a positive integer and 10 ^ a – 74 in decimal notation has digits whose sum is 440 , what is the value of a ?

two ants , arthur and amy , have discovered a picnic and are bringing crumbs back to the anthill . amy makes twice as many trips and carries one and a half times as many crumbs per trip as arthur . if arthur carries a total of m crumbs to the anthill , how many crumbs will amy bring to the anthill , in terms of m ?
in 120 m race , a covers the distance in 36 seconds and b in 45 seconds . in this race a beats b by :
18 balls are numbered 1 to 18 . a ball is drawn and then another ball is drawn without replacement . what is the probability that both balls have even numbers ?
a mixture contains milk and water in the ratio 5 : 2 . on adding 10 liters of water , the ratio of milk to water becomes 5 : 3 . the quantity of milk in the original mixture is ?
a rectangular plot measuring 60 meters by 50 meters is to be enclosed by wire fencing . if the poles of the fence are kept 5 meters apart . how many poles will be needed ?
on a certain test , bill scored 20 more points than john , but half as many points as sue . if the sum of the scores of the 3 students was 160 points , how many points did bill receive ?

on sunday , bill ran 4 more miles than he ran on saturday . julia did not run on saturday , but she ran twice the number of miles on sunday that bill ran on sunday . if bill and julia ran a total of 28 miles on saturday and sunday , how many miles did bill run on sunday ?
rakesh credits 15 % of his salary in his fixed deposit account and spends 30 % of the remaining amount on groceries . if the cash in hand is rs . 2380 , what is his salary ?

a snail , climbing a 36 feet high wall , climbs up 8 feet on the first day but slides down 4 feet on the second . it climbs 8 feet on the third day and slides down again 4 feet on the fourth day . if this pattern continues , how many days will it take the snail to reach the top of the wall ?
how many integers are between 5 and 96 / 7 , inclusive ?
the diagonal of a rectangle is cm and its area is 20 sq . cm . the perimeter of the rectangle must be :
on a test average ( arithmetic mean ) test score for 9 students is 80 . what must be 10 th student ' s score that average score for 10 students to be 82 ?
of 3 numbers , the third is twice the first and the second is 4 times the first . if their average is 77 , the smallest of the 3 numbers is :
two trains are moving in opposite directions @ 100 kmph and 120 kmph . their length are 500 m and 700 m . the time taken by the slower train to cross faster train in second is ?
in a kilometer race , a beats b by 20 meters or 10 seconds . what time does a take to complete the race ?
a number when divided by 20 leaves 6 as a remainder . what will be the remainder if the number is divided by 19 ?
when the number 2 y 31129 is exactly divisible by 11 , then what can be the smallest whole number in place of y ?

in a certain business school class , p students are accounting majors , q students are finance majors , r students are marketing majors , and s students are strategy majors . if pqrs = 1365 , and if 1 < p < q < r < s , how many students in the class are finance majors ?
a trained covered x km at 40 kmph and another 2 x km at 20 kmph . find the average speed of the train in covering the entire 5 x km .
a batsman scored 90 runs which included 2 boundaries and 7 sixes . what percent of his total score did he make by running between the wickets .
$ 200 is divided amongst a , b and c so that a may get 2 / 3 as much as b and c together , b may get 6 / 9 as much as a and c together , then the share of a is
how many of the positive factors of 14 are not factors of 21 ?

the amount of time that three people worked on a special project was in the ratio of 2 to 3 to 4 . if the project took 90 hours , how many more hours did the hardest working person work than the person who worked the least ?

the volume of a sphere with radius r is ( 4 / 3 ) * pi * r ^ 3 and the surface area is 4 * pi * r ^ 3 . if a sperical balloon has a volume of 36 pi cubic centimeters , what is hte surface area of the balloon in square centimeters ?
the total age of a and b is 12 years more than the total age of b and c . c is how many year younger than a ?
how long does a train 110 m long travelling at 60 kmph takes to cross a bridge of 170 m in length ?

the megatek corporation is displaying its distribution of employees by department in a circle graph . the size of each sector of the graph representing a department is proportional to the percentage of total employees in that department . if the section of the circle graph representing the manufacturing department takes up 144 ° of the circle , what percentage of megatek employees are in manufacturing ?

60 litres of diesel is required to travel 600 km using a 800 cc engine . if the volume of diesel required to cover a distance varies directly as the capacity of the engine , then how many litres of diesel is required to travel 800 km using 1200 cc engine ?

a charitable association sold an average of 66 raffle tickets per member . among the female members , the average was 70 raffle tickets . the male to female ratio of the association is 1 : 2 . what was the average number r of tickets sold by the male members of the association
the average of 100 , 200300 and x is 250 and the average of 300 , 150100 , x and y is 200 . what is the value of y ?
